org.lsmr.vending.hardware

Interface CoinReceptacleListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AbstractHardwareListener

    public interface CoinReceptacleListener
extends AbstractHardwareListener
    Listens for events emanating from a coin receptacle.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void coinAdded(CoinReceptacle receptacle, Coin coin)
      An event that announces that the indicated coin has been added to the indicated receptacle.
      void coinsFull(CoinReceptacle receptacle)
      An event that announces that the indicated receptacle is now full.
      void coinsLoaded(CoinReceptacle receptacle, Coin... coins)
      Announces that the indicated sequence of coins has been added to the indicated coin receptacle.
      void coinsRemoved(CoinReceptacle receptacle)
      An event that announces that all coins have been removed from the indicated receptacle.
      void coinsUnloaded(CoinReceptacle receptacle, Coin... coins)
      Announces that the indicated sequence of coins has been removed to the indicated coin receptacle.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.lsmr.vending.hardware.AbstractHardwareListener

        disabled, enabled

    • Method Detail

      • coinAdded

        void coinAdded(CoinReceptacle receptacle,
               Coin coin)
        An event that announces that the indicated coin has been added to the indicated receptacle.
        Parameters:
        receptacle - The receptacle where the event happened.
        coin - The coin added.

      • coinsRemoved

        void coinsRemoved(CoinReceptacle receptacle)
        An event that announces that all coins have been removed from the indicated receptacle.
        Parameters:
        receptacle - The receptacle where the event happened.

      • coinsFull

        void coinsFull(CoinReceptacle receptacle)
        An event that announces that the indicated receptacle is now full.
        Parameters:
        receptacle - The receptacle where the event happened.

      • coinsLoaded

        void coinsLoaded(CoinReceptacle receptacle,
                 Coin... coins)
        Announces that the indicated sequence of coins has been added to the indicated coin receptacle. Used to simulate direct, physical loading of the receptacle.
        Parameters:
        receptacle - The receptacle where the event occurred.
        coins - The coins that were loaded.

      • coinsUnloaded

        void coinsUnloaded(CoinReceptacle receptacle,
                   Coin... coins)
        Announces that the indicated sequence of coins has been removed to the indicated coin receptacle. Used to simulate direct, physical unloading of the receptacle.
        Parameters:
        receptacle - The receptacle where the event occurred.
        coins - The coins that were unloaded.
